"Area Survey: Remnants of Other Worlds":
"Each time you clear \"Area Survey: Remnants of Other Worlds\" by reaching the maximum available depth, a new level of depth becomes available on your next attempt.

The deeper you go, the more powerful Omega Masquerade will be when it appears.

However, a more powerful enemy will give better rewards when it is defeated. Also, additional rewards are given each time you reach your current maximum depth."

"The Omega Masquerade that appears in this area is an extremely powerful and dangerous enemy.

Because suppressing it requires a great deal of power, each player has a limit on how often they can clear this quest.

You may only clear the quest up to 5 times each day. The number of clears you have remaining resets at 20:00 every day."
